metadata.title: Browser Tab Logo Icon (Favicon) and Metadata Icon Wiring
metadata.prd_reference: Brand/UX polish expectations for production-readiness and trust-oriented presentation

context.background: The browser tab icon should use the Healio logo mark (brand-consistent favicon) instead of a generic placeholder icon. This improves polish, recognizability, and deployment readiness for the public site and dashboard pages.

design_constraints.constraint: Use a simple, high-contrast mark that remains legible at small favicon sizes (16x16 / 32x32 equivalents).
Keep the icon visually consistent with Healio branding used on the landing page header/logo mark.
Ensure the app emits valid icon metadata so the favicon loads reliably across routes.
Do not introduce heavy image assets when a lightweight SVG icon is sufficient.

instruction.step: Create or update the favicon/icon asset so the browser tab displays the Healio logo mark (not a generic placeholder).
Wire explicit metadata icon references in `healio/app/layout.tsx` if needed to improve reliability across browsers/routes.
Verify the icon asset loads successfully in the running app and confirm icon link metadata exists in the page head.
Use Chrome DevTools MCP to inspect the page head/network and record favicon verification evidence before marking done.

validation_checklist.check: The tab icon asset is a Healio-branded mark and is visually simple enough for small sizes.
No 404/icon load errors occur for the favicon asset during page load.
Chrome DevTools MCP evidence includes head icon metadata inspection and/or successful icon network request.
`npm run typecheck` is run if `healio/app/layout.tsx` is modified.

artifacts.artifact: Updated favicon/icon asset using Healio logo mark

acceptance_criteria.criterion: The browser tab icon is updated to a Healio-branded logo mark.
The icon asset is referenced correctly by the app and loads without runtime errors.
Chrome DevTools MCP verification evidence is recorded before task completion.
The task XML is updated with execution evidence and renamed with `DONE_` prefix after completion.

output_spec.commit_message: feat(healio-branding): use healio logo for browser tab icon

evidence.item: When work starts/completes, record changed files, Chrome DevTools MCP favicon checks, and commit references here.
Include Chrome DevTools MCP evidence (head icon link inspection and/or successful icon network request) before marking complete.

execution_tracking.completion_signal: Task is done only when state=DONE, is_done=true, completed_at is filled, verification_status=PASSED, and evidence records changed files/verification/commits as applicable.
